General.Name: Hubei Guochuang Hi-tech Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Guochuang Hi-tech Material Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate service business and the research, development, production, and sale of modified asphalt in China. The company offers SBS modified, high viscosity modified, rubber, colored, and flame retardant asphalt; and high modulus asphalt mixture additives, emulsified asphalt and modified emulsified asphalt, cement asphalt mortars, asphalt pavement regeneration reductants, asphalt pavement waterproof and oil repellent agents, bridge preventive maintenance coating materials, and epoxy asphalt steel bridge maintenance materials. It also provides road engineering maintenance equipment includes micro-surfacing, containing sand mist seal, ultra-thin wear layer, synchronous gravel seal, recycled asphalt pavement, warm asphalt pavement, cold repair, and snow melting anti-icing equipment. Hubei Guochuang Hi-tech Material Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Wuhan, China.
General.Address: Guochuang Group Office Building, Wuhan, China, 430223
